title: All The Wrong Reasons
description: I wanted the total college experience.I wanted stories to giggle over with my roommates.I was tired of being the dutiful daughter and granddaughter.Tired of being Dustinâ€™s girlfriend.I wanted to live.Then I met sexy Lucas. That first night with him was a mistake.So was the second, the third...And what about Dustin?
author: J.L. Paul
